definitions.definition: Something that is not compulsory, especially part of an academic course .
In various programming languages , a kind of variable that is assigned a specific data type but may or may not hold an actual value .

main_definition: Something that is not compulsory, especially part of an academic course .
secondary_definitions: ( programming , sometimes capitalized ) In various programming languages , a kind of variable that is assigned a specific data type but may or may not hold an actual value .
